title: I bought mystery chest & skin but didnt get anything..
body:
I bought mystery chest & skin but didnt get anything..

not even show at purchases category..

afriad to buy again...

replies.body:
If you purchased RP on something, we definitely want to make sure it ended up in your account.  I went ahead and took a look into your account specifically, and I do see two mystery purchases from the other day:  Captain Volibear and Arclight Varus.  Otherwise, I don't see any RP removed from your account from today.

Let me know if you still seem to be missing some content!
